title: Disconnected User Flow
description: Verify the flow for a visitor not logged in: browse products, view details, view shop, and check authentication triggers.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Check that the home page is loaded and products are visible
Click on a product card
Verify navigation to the product detail page
Verify product price, title, and images are displayed
Scroll to reviews section and verify reviews are displayed (if any)
Click on the shop name or visit shop link
Verify navigation to the store page
Navigate back to the product detail page
Click on the 'Acheter' (Buy) button
Verify redirection to the authentication page

title: Buyer Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a buyer can successfully log in with correct username and password and is redirected to buyer dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid buyer email and password
Click on login button
Check that login is successful and user is redirected to buyer dashboard

title: Seller Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a seller can successfully log in with correct username and password and is redirected to seller dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid seller email and password
Click on login button
Check that login is successful and user is redirected to seller dashboard

title: Affiliate Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that an affiliate can successfully log in with correct username and password and is redirected to affiliate dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid affiliate email and password
Click on login button
Check that login is successful and user is redirected to affiliate dashboard

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Validate that login fails with incorrect password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email with incorrect password
Click on login button
Verify login failure and error message about incorrect credentials is displayed

title: Real-Time Product Search by Keyword
description: Verify that buyers can search products by keywords and the displayed results update in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace homepage
Enter a product keyword in search input
Verify product list updates in real-time with matching products

title: Filter Products by Price Range
description: Verify that buyers can filter product search results by setting minimum and maximum price constraints.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace homepage
Set minimum and maximum price filters
Verify product list updates showing only products within the selected price range

title: Filter Products by Category
description: Verify that buyers can filter product search results by selecting one or multiple categories.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace homepage
Select one or multiple categories to filter
Verify only products belonging to selected categories are displayed

title: View Product Details with Images, MOQ, and Commission Info
description: Check that product detail page displays product images, minimum order quantity (MOQ), and commission settings correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page from product listings
Verify images are displayed
Verify MOQ information is visible
Verify commission details for product are displayed

title: Buyer Initiates Chat and Sends Message to Seller
description: Verify buyer can start chat with seller from product page and send messages which appear in real-time for seller.

steps.description: Navigate to product page
Click to start chat with seller
Send chat message
Verify chat message is received instantly by seller

title: Seller Receives Chat Message and Sends Offer
description: Verify seller receives buyer's chat messages and can create and send price/quantity offer during negotiation.

steps.description: Seller views incoming chat messages
Seller creates an offer with proposed price and quantity
Seller sends offer in chat
Verify offer is delivered and visible to buyer

title: Buyer Accepts Seller Offer
description: Verify buyer can accept seller offer during chat negotation and items are added to buyer's cart accordingly.

steps.description: Buyer views seller offer in chat
Buyer accepts the offer
Verify items from offer are added to cart with correct price and quantity

title: Add Product with Valid Data by Seller
description: Verify seller can create a new product listing by inputting valid product details including images, MOQ, commission, and publish it.

steps.description: Seller navigates to add product page
Input product name, description, category, price, MOQ, commission, and upload images
Submit product creation form
Verify product is created and listed with all details and images

title: Add Product with Missing Required Fields
description: Validate that product creation fails and shows error messages if required fields or images are missing.

steps.description: Seller navigates to add product page
Attempt to submit product form missing mandatory fields or images
Verify error messages are shown and product is not created

title: Edit Existing Product Details
description: Verify seller can successfully edit product details and changes are instantly reflected in product listings.

steps.description: Seller navigates to edit product page for an existing product
Modify product fields such as price, MOQ, commission or images
Submit the updates
Verify product details are updated and displayed correctly

title: Add to Cart Enforces MOQ Validation
description: Verify buyer cannot add product to cart if quantity is below MOQ unless there is a negotiated offer allowing it.

steps.description: Buyer navigates to product page
Attempt to add product to cart with quantity less than MOQ and without an offer
Verify add to cart is blocked and user is shown MOQ validation error
Buyer accepts negotiated offer with quantity less than MOQ
Verify product can be added to cart with offer quantity below MOQ

title: Complete Order Payment Summary and Validation
description: Verify order payment page displays correct order summary including product prices, commissions, and total amount before payment.

steps.description: Buyer proceeds to order payment page from cart
Verify payment summary shows all ordered products with correct prices and commissions
Verify the total payable amount is accurate

title: Order Status Tracking and OTP Delivery Confirmation
description: Verify buyer can track order status from processing to shipped to delivered, and can confirm delivery by entering correct OTP sent to them.

steps.description: Buyer views order status page
Verify order status shows correct current status (e.g., processing, shipped)
Upon delivery, buyer inputs OTP received for delivery confirmation
Verify OTP is validated successfully and order status is updated to delivered

title: OTP Code Generation and Verification Flow
description: Validate that OTP codes are correctly generated when seller marks order as shipped, sent to buyer, and verified upon delivery confirmation.

steps.description: Seller marks order as shipped, triggering OTP generation
Verify OTP code is generated and transmitted to buyer
Buyer inputs OTP code for order
Verify OTP validation succeeds and funds release process initiates

title: Seller Dashboard Product CRUD Visibility and Operations
description: Verify seller dashboard displays all created products and supports product edit, publish, and delete operations with immediate effect.

steps.description: Seller navigates to dashboard product section
Verify all seller's products are listed
Edit a product and save changes
Verify product details update instantly
Delete a product
Verify product is removed from listing

title: Affiliate Link Generation and Commission Tracking
description: Verify affiliate can generate unique referral links, share them, and that clicks and conversions are tracked and commissions are updated accordingly.

steps.description: Affiliate generates a promotional referral link via dashboard
Verify unique referral link is created and displayed
Simulate clicks and conversions via that referral link
Verify clicks and conversions count update accurately in affiliate dashboard
Verify affiliate commission amount reflects the conversions

title: Affiliate VIP Partnership Request Submission
description: Verify affiliate users can request VIP partnership via dashboard and the request is recorded for admin review.

steps.description: Affiliate navigates to VIP partnership request section
Fill and submit VIP partnership request form
Verify request submission confirmation and record saved

title: Buyer Submits Product Review and Rating after Order Delivery
description: Verify buyer can submit rating and review for a product after order is marked delivered and the product rating average updates accordingly.

steps.description: Buyer navigates to purchased product page after delivery confirmation
Submit rating and review form with valid input
Verify review is saved and visible under product reviews section
Verify product average rating updates correctly

title: Commission Allocation upon Order Completion
description: Verify commissions for sellers and affiliates are correctly calculated and allocated after successful order payment and delivery confirmation with OTP.

steps.description: Complete buyer order with products having commission set
Confirm delivery via OTP
Verify seller commission is updated in seller dashboard
Verify affiliate commission is credited based on referral and visible in affiliate dashboard

title: Cart Validation Disables Ordering Below MOQ Without Offer
description: Verify that the cart prevents checkout if any product quantity is below MOQ and no negotiated offer exists, showing an appropriate validation error.

steps.description: Add product to cart with quantity below MOQ and no offer
Attempt to proceed to checkout
Verify checkout is disabled and a validation error is presented

title: Seller Order Processing Workflow End-to-End
description: Verify that seller can view order details, mark order as shipped with OTP generation and later confirm delivery, releasing funds accordingly.

steps.description: Seller views new order details
Mark order as shipped and generate OTP
Verify OTP is generated and linked to the order
Buyer confirms delivery with OTP
Verify funds are released to seller after successful OTP validation

title: Dashboards Display Accurate Sales, Orders, and Commissions
description: Verify buyer, seller, and affiliate dashboards show correct metrics like sales totals, order counts, commissions earned, and withdrawal statuses.

steps.description: Login as each user role and navigate to dashboard
Verify that displayed metrics correspond to actual user data
Trigger withdrawal request (where applicable)
Verify withdrawal request processes and dashboard updates accordingly

title: Session Storage Persists Affiliate Referral Tracking
description: Verify that affiliate referral tracking information is persisted in sessionStorage and correctly associated with referrals and orders.

steps.description: Access marketplace via affiliate referral link
Verify referral tracking data is stored in sessionStorage
Place an order during session
Verify that affiliate commission is linked to order based on stored referral data
